lead_paragraph: On her previous trip to the Century Regional Detention Facility in Lynwood, Calif., in 2007, Lindsay Lohan was incarcerated for just under 90 minutes after arrests for drunken driving and cocaine possession. On a return visit, she was there only slightly longer: The Associated Press reported that Ms. Lohan, the 24-year-old "Mean Girls" and "Freaky Friday" star, was released from the facility on Monday at 1:35 a.m. Pacific time, having been jailed for less than two weeks of a 90-day sentence for violating the terms of her probation.
snippet: The actress was incarcerated for less than two weeks of a 90-day sentence for violating the terms of her probation.

headline.main: Lindsay Lohan Is Released From Jail to Rehab

abstract: The actress was incarcerated for less than two weeks of a 90-day sentence for violating the terms of her probation.
